00025 #ifndef _BASE_SINEXPRESSION_
00026 #define _BASE_SINEXPRESSION_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/consts>
00030 #include <base/UnaryOpExpression>
00031 #include <base/ProductExpression>
00032 #include <base/CosExpression>
00033 
00034 namespace base {
00035 
00036 
00037 //
00038 // Evaluates the sin of it's argument
00039 //
00040 
00041 class SinExpression : public UnaryOpExpression 
00042 {
00043 public:
00044   SinExpression(ref<ExpressionNode> arg)
00045     : UnaryOpExpression(arg) {}
00046   SinExpression(const SinExpression& e)
00047     : UnaryOpExpression(e) {}
00048 
00049   virtual NodeType type() const { return NodeType(UnaryOp|Sine); } 
00050 
00051   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewObj SinExpression(*this); }
00052   virtual String className() const { return String("SinExpression"); }
00053 
00054   virtual String toString() const { return String("sin(")+arg->toString()+")"; }
00055 
00056 protected:
00057   SinExpression() {}
00058 
00059   virtual void cacheValue(const Vector& params) const
00060     { value = base::sin( arg->evaluate(params) ); valueCached=true; }
00061 
00062   virtual void cacheDerivative(Int withRespectToIndex) const
00063     {
00064       derivative = ref<ExpressionNode>( NewObj ProductExpression( ref<ExpressionNode>(NewObj CosExpression(arg)),
00065                                                                   arg->differentiate(withRespectToIndex)) ); 
00066       derivWithRespToIndex = withRespectToIndex;
00067       derivCached = true;
00068     }
00069 
00070   virtual void operationCounts(Int& addsub, Int& multdiv, Int& trig) const 
00071     { UnaryOpExpression::operationCounts(addsub,multdiv,trig); trig++; }
00072   
00073   friend class Serializable::SerializableDerivedInstantiator<SinExpression>;
00074 };
00075 
00076 } // base
00077 
00078 #endif
